reviews.title: Good value for the price
reviews.text: The Gastehaus Viktoria (Viktoria Guesthouse) in Rothenburg ob der Tauber is a very nice accommodation tucked into one corner of Rothenburg. As a result it is quiet. The rooms are very cozy and quite comfortable, equipped with an en-suite shower, private toilet, satellite TV. The only problem was that the room was small and there was not any room to layout suitcases.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Gastehaus Viktoria is affiliated with the Altfrankisch Weinstube restaurant which is just a few streets away, and a wonderful breakfast is provided each morning at the Altfrankische Weinstube.
reviews.title: Lovely guest house accomodation in Rothenbrug

likes.liked: — Charming accomodations, convenient location and value for the money
